abstract: The chief financial officer of an investment vehicle for Carl C. Icahn is leaving to take another job, the firm said in a regulatory filing Tuesday. The executive, Hillel Moerman, gave notice of his resignation to the Icahn company, American Real Estate Partners, last week, and the company said it did not make a counteroffer.
lead_paragraph: The chief financial officer of an investment vehicle for Carl C. Icahn is leaving to take another job, the firm said in a regulatory filing Tuesday. The executive, Hillel Moerman, gave notice of his resignation to the Icahn company, American Real Estate Partners, last week, and the company said it did not make a counteroffer.
